text: Zanonaton kistzori sumo hastand, pas har tavre ki dust dored, ʙo zanonaton aloqa kuned, (ammo aloqa dar coe, ki Alloh halol farmudaast, ja'ne coe, ki farzand ʙa dunjo meojad.) Va ʙo ʙa co ovardani korhoi xuʙ ʙa Alloh nazdiki cued. Va dar hamai holat az Alloh ʙitarsed. Va ʙidoned, ki hatman sumo U ta'oloro xohed did. Va mu'minonro muƶda deh az cizhoe, ki onhoro dar oxirat xursand mekunand
